author: barnabasbusa
content:
```
Pectra
pectra-devnet-4
Erigon can't propose with anyone but lighthouse. Possibly engine api issue.
Grandine block proposal is not working. Plan to do big deposit queue this week. 

pectra-devnet-5
7742 spec is still not finalized. Client teams wait for the final spec to be released, before finishing up implementations. 
BLS precompile topic is still open. Possibly wait for final decision by end of the week. 

Peerdas
peerdas-devnet-3
Its dead. Whats next? - possibly wait for pectra-devnet-5 launch before we relaunch devnet 4. Lets wait for the final spec to be released, before finishing up implementations. - Wait for breakout room discussion for decision. 

EOF - Fusaka
eof-devnet-0 -  fusaka-devnet-0
rebased on alpha 8 - built on top of devnet 4 spec
osakaTime as the fork activation
launch in ~ 1 week time
Besu - is ready
Reth - osaka is ready
Nethermind - osaka is ready
Will do some testing this week to see if we could launch an EL only devnet before Devcon. 
```
